mapper.update: update GPMS_SUBJECT set state=#{subject.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SUB_ID=#{subject.subId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select s.SUB_ID,s.TITLE,s.REQUIRE,s.INTRO,s.state,s.CREATE_AT,s.creator,bu1.user_nm create_Nm, s.doer,bu2.user_nm doer_Nm,s.MOD_AT,s.moder,bu3.user_nm moder_Nm,s.FILE_URL from GPMS_SUBJECT s left join base_user bu1 on s.creator=bu1.user_id left join base_user bu2 on s.doer=bu2.user_id left join base_user bu3 on s.moder=bu3.user_id where doer=#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
